column5: The episode for Bass Fanatics.  First, Team X Mark Kulik finds a late season smallmouth bassin` bonanza on the Kawartha lakes. The smallies are stacked on the rock shoals and Mizmo tubes are the main course for the day! Then show host, K-Dawg puts down the Flip-Stick and picks up the stick worm and catches a bunch of lazy summer day largemouth sittin` amongst deeper weeds `n wood.  The action never stops when your watching Extreme Angler TV!!  http://www.extremeanglertv.com   Extreme Army Team Member Spike
